values: 重的；沉重的；（债务或税收）繁重的；（呼吸）粗重的；浓厚的；浓密的；厚的；大而结实的；密度高的；（天气）阴沉的；（睡眠）沉的；（食物）难消化的；（音乐）重金属的；非常的；沉的；（犯罪或罪行）严重的；超出一般的；过度的；笨重的；笨拙的；重型的；重量大的；大量的；（做某事）过量的；工作（或活动）多的；大而结实的；苛刻的
重要人物；重要角色；主要角色；要员；严肃报纸；重型产品；保镖；打手；壮汉
沉重地；剧烈地；密集地；笨重地；强烈地；大量地；沉甸甸地

synonym.mean: 沉重的；繁重的，巨大的；阴沉的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 沉重；沉闷；笨拙；迟钝；忧伤

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指实际上而不是相对的沉重，引申指严重或重要。
普通用词，指重量或体积大大超过同类物体，常用作引申，多指精神上的重压等。

word_group.brief_definition: 拥挤的交通；大流量交通；繁忙运输
重担；沉重负担；繁重负担
严厉手段；粗暴方式, 暴虐方式
难以打交道, 难以处理, 难以理解

bilingual.source: I take a heavy bag to school, but what can I do?
bilingual.target: 我带着一个沉重的书包去上学，但我能做什么呢？

bilingual.source: Stepping out of the station with a heavy heart, I suddenly feel a fresh wind on my face.
bilingual.target: 带着沉重的心情走出车站，我突然感到脸上有一阵清风。
他穿了一件笨重的外套。
他容易地举起了那个沉重的箱子。

bilingual.source: He tried to pull the heavy box.
bilingual.target: 他试图拉那个沉重的箱子。

bilingual.source: He tried to drag the heavy table.
bilingual.target: 他用力拖拽那张沉重的桌子。

bilingual.source: How heavy a barbell can you lift?
He tried to move the heavy object.
bilingual.target: 他试图移动那个重的物体。

bilingual.source: He carried a heavy sack back home.
bilingual.target: 他背着一个沉重的麻袋走回家。

list.abstract: 来自Train（追随者合唱团），美国加利福尼亚州旧金山的摇滚乐队，成立于1994年。
《heavy》是Linkin Park - (林肯公园) / Kiiara演唱的一首英文歌曲。 2018年4月，《heavy》获得2018年度公告牌音乐奖最佳摇滚歌曲提名。

yingyinNormal.en: Do I look like I lift weights? Not heavy ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看我像练举重的人吗？举不了很重吧。

yingyinNormal.en: It's interesting, but it serves with a little bit of pork in it. Heavy ginger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 挺有趣的，里面还加了一点猪肉。好重的姜味。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, I don't really want to be doing this right now. I am carrying a very heavy couch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在不想讲这个，我抬着一张很重的沙发。

yingyinNormal.en: Fascinating creatures, phoenixes. They can carry immensely heavy loads. Their tears have healing powers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凤凰真是迷人的生物。它们载得动比它重的多的东西。而且它们的眼泪可以治病。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Fear of foreign competition once led countries to try and produce everything they needed and impose heavy taxes to keep out foreign goods.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对外国竞争感到的恐惧让一些国家决定自给自足，自行生产所有产品，并且向国外的商品收相当重的税。

yingyinNormal.en: But the trouble is, getting heavy things like people, not to mention space ships, up to such speeds requires unimaginable amounts of energy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但问题是，要把像人一样那么重的东西，莫说太空飞船了，移动到达接近光速般，是需要不能想象的巨大能量。

yingyinNormal.en: You're really heavy. Really? Thank you!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真重。真的? 谢谢你!

yingyinNormal.en: Why do I always have to carry the heavy stuff?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么我总是出力？

yingyinNormal.en: It is surprisingly heavy when you are doing this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样舞动时，真是沉得出奇。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not taking it. Why not? It's too heavy. Well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不收。为什么？钱太多了。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, was the tree heavy? It was a bit heavy, yes. I hope the tree fits in our house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，这棵树重吗？对，是有点重。希望我们家放得下这棵树。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, was the tree heavy? It was a bit heavy, yes. I hope the tree fits in our house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，这棵树重吗？对，是有点重。希望我们家放得下这棵树。

yingyinNormal.en: I hope you're a heavy metal fan because all the heavy metals are going right here above your trophy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 希望你喜欢重金属摇滚乐，因为整个"金属"周期表要挂到你奖杯头顶上了。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig, you are much too heavy for that branch! Nonsense! I know exactly how heavy I am. There! Hurray!
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，猪爸爸，你太重了，那根撑不住的。你这是在胡说，我知道我自己究竟有多重，够到了。好嘞。

yingyinNormal.en: So it is with a heavy heart that I assume the throne.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在极悲恸的心情下登上王位。

yingyinNormal.en: Isn't that thing a little heavy? Yeah, but I don't mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个东西不会有点重么？沉啊，不过没关系。

yingyinNormal.en: It was a dreadful, heavy thing. I only wore it this once.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那东西重得不得了，我只戴过一次。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. A hammer so heavy that no one else can pick it up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 可不是嘛，什么一把重到只有雷神才举得起的铁锤啊？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, you're so lucky. My fiancee wants the heavy metal band Carcass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真幸运，我未婚夫想请“动物尸体重金属乐团”。

yingyinNormal.en: So it's gonna be quite strong. Quite a heavy bread but fantastic to eat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吃起来味道很重确实很重，但是很好吃。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 沉重地；猛烈地；沉闷地；在很大程度上

word_family.mean: adj. 沉重；密度大的；浓厚的；超过一般的；沉重的；重体力的；繁重的；重重的；沉甸甸的；重型的

sense_info_list.en: more or worse than usual in amount, degree, etc.

examination_example.sentence: Democrats, Republicans, the Postal Service, the unions and the system's <highlight>heaviest</highlight> users have agreed on a plan to fix the system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 民主党人、共和党人、邮政部门、工会和系统的最大用户就修复系统的计划达成一致。

examination_example.sentence: Impose a <highlight>heavier</highlight> burden on immigrants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加重移民的负担。

sense_info_list.en: weighing a lot

examination_example.sentence: For example, <highlight>heavier</highlight> women are less likely to develop calcium deficiency than thin women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，体重较重的女性比瘦的女性更不容易出现缺钙。

sense_info_list.en: falling or hitting something with a lot of force
hot and lacking fresh air
thick; large and solid
full of or loaded with something
involving a lot of work or activity; hard
using a lot of something
difficult to understand or enjoy
a large strong man whose job is to protect a person or place, often using violence
strong beer, especially bitter
loud and deep

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使用很多...的; 过量的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 沉重地；猛烈地；沉闷地；在很大程度上

word_family.mean: adj. 沉重；密度大的；浓厚的；超过一般的；沉重的；重体力的；繁重的；重重的；沉甸甸的；重型的

sense_info_list.zh: 使用很多...的; 过量的

examination_example.sentence: That, too, explains the <highlight>heavy</highlight> Washington presence at this year's show, as these new technologies intrude upon heavily regulated areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些新技术侵入了受到严格监管的领域，所以在今年的展会上美国政府进行了如此大的干预。

examination_example.sentence: This is much like a non-smoker getting cancer from second-hand smoke, while the <highlight>heavy</highlight> smoker is fortunate enough to smoke in good health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这很像一个不吸烟的人因为二手烟而得癌症，而烟瘾大的人却很幸运地拥有健康的身体。

examination_example.sentence: The low-self-control study members are more likely to be the parent is in poor health and likely to be a <highlight>heavy</highlight> substance abuser.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 低自控力的研究成员更有可能是父母一方健康状况不佳，有可能是重度物质滥用者。

sense_info_list.en: large in amount or very solid

examination_example.sentence: Policymakers in India have traditionally pushed for a cereal-<highlight>heavy</highlight> "vegetarian diet" on a meat-eating population as a way of providing the cheapest sources of food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 印度的政策制定者，历来推动对肉食人群实行以谷物为主的“素食饮食”，以此作为提供最廉价食物来源的一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: There is a growing popularity of a cereal-<highlight>heavy</highlight> vegetarian diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 富含谷类的素食饮食越来越受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: Colleges are reluctant to admit that graduates today are in <highlight>heavier</highlight> debt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大学不愿意承认今天的毕业生负债累累。

examination_example.sentence: In 1892, The Gentlewoman's Book of Sport described a woman swimming in a <highlight>heavy</highlight> dress, boots, hat, gloves and carrying an umbrella.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1892年，《贵妇人运动手册》描述了一位女士穿着厚重的连衣裙、靴子、帽子、手套，手持雨伞游泳（的情景）。

examination_example.sentence: Impose <highlight>heavier</highlight> penalties on speeding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对超速驾驶处以更重的处罚。

sense_info_list.en: involving a lot of work or activity

examination_example.sentence: They are exhausted even without doing any <highlight>heavy</highlight> work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使不做任何辛苦的工作，他们也筋疲力尽。

examination_example.sentence: Had the bell towers' wooden frames burned down, the <highlight>heavy</highlight> bells would have crashed down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果钟楼的木架被烧毁，沉重的钟就会倒塌。

examination_example.sentence: Local kinds vary from the light rums of Puerto Rico to the <highlight>heavier</highlight> darker rums of Barbados and Jamaica.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地的朗姆酒种类繁多，从波多黎各的淡朗姆酒到巴巴多斯和牙买加的较浓较暗的朗姆酒。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 沉重地；猛烈地；沉闷地；在很大程度上

word_family.mean: adj. 沉重；密度大的；浓厚的；超过一般的；沉重的；重体力的；繁重的；重重的；沉甸甸的；重型的

examination_example.sentence: It makes life so much simpler—no carrying <highlight>heavy</highlight> shopping bags in the rain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让生活变得简单多了——不用在雨中提着沉重的购物袋。

examination_example.sentence: These have a flat back with a rounded top, and are very <highlight>heavy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们的背部是扁平的，顶部是圆形的，而且非常重。

examination_example.sentence: They think they're <highlight>heavier</highlight> than they are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她们认为自己比实际重。

examination_example.sentence: They claimed damages for their <highlight>heavy</highlight> losses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们就重大损失要求损害赔偿。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>heavy</highlight> snow made driving very difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大雪使得驾驶非常困难。

examination_example.sentence: Scotland's transport minister has warned of potentially extreme weather conditions as <highlight>heavy</highlight> snow is forecast across the country later this week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 苏格兰交通部长警告说，由于本周晚些时候全国将有大雪，可能会出现极端天气环境。

sense_info_list.en: large in amount or very solid

examination_example.sentence: It's a bit <highlight>heavy</highlight>, but it's great food for a cold night like this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有点重，但对于像这样寒冷的夜晚来说是很棒的食物。

examination_example.sentence: The British Airports Authority is addressing the problem through a programme of <highlight>heavy</highlight> investment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国机场管理局正在通过一项大规模投资计划来解决这一问题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 沉重地；猛烈地；沉闷地；在很大程度上

word_family.mean: adj. 沉重；密度大的；浓厚的；超过一般的；沉重的；重体力的；繁重的；重重的；沉甸甸的；重型的

examination_example.sentence: The seats were so uncomfortable that only a very <highlight>heavy</highlight> sleeper could manage to get any rest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 座位太不舒服了，只有睡得很沉的人才能休息一下。

examination_example.sentence: Vinnie confirmed her ability to make a full-length statue by highlighting the <highlight>heavy</highlight> labor she had done before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Vinnie强调了她之前所做的繁重劳动，从而证实了她制作全身雕像的能力。

examination_example.sentence: You should avoid eating with <highlight>heavier</highlight> people who order large portions (份).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该避免和那些点大份食物的胖子一起吃饭。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (数量/程度)剧烈的; 超出一般的
繁忙的; 辛苦的; 沉重的
量大的; 难以消化的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 沉重地；猛烈地；沉闷地；在很大程度上

word_family.mean: adj. 沉重；密度大的；浓厚的；超过一般的；沉重的；重体力的；繁重的；重重的；沉甸甸的；重型的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 拥挤的交通；大流量交通；繁忙运输

sense_info_list.en: weighing a lot; difficult to lift or move

examination_example.sentence: They are one of the world's <highlight>heaviest</highlight> animals, and their hearts are the biggest of any animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们是世界上最重的动物之一，它们的心脏也是所有动物中最大的。

examination_example.sentence: The little girl felt her net growing <highlight>heavy</highlight> and was very happy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小女孩觉得她的网越来越重，就非常高兴。

examination_example.sentence: She had just turned away when she heard a <highlight>heavy</highlight> fall and a few cries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她刚转过身去，就听到一声重重摔落，还有几声喊叫声。

sense_info_list.en: more or worse than usual in amount, degree, etc.
sense_info_list.zh: (数量/程度)剧烈的; 超出一般的

examination_example.sentence: Although the traffic was <highlight>heavy</highlight>, we got to the railway station on time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管交通拥挤，我们还是准时到达火车站。

examination_example.sentence: In the night sky, the clouds look dark and <highlight>heavy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夜空中，云看起来又黑又重。

examination_example.sentence: The beavers' dams slow down the speed of the river, especially after <highlight>heavy</highlight> rain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 河狸筑的水坝减缓了河水的流速，尤其是在大雨之后。

sense_info_list.en: (machines, vehicles or weapons) large and powerful

examination_example.sentence: Sara was late for school because of the <highlight>heavy</highlight> rain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为下大雨，萨拉上学迟到了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Heavy</highlight> Industry
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重工业

examination_example.sentence: Artificial Intelligence (人工智能) has been used in many different fields to perform certain tasks, including education, <highlight>heavy</highlight> industry and toys and so on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人工智能已经被用于许多不同的领域来执行某些任务，包括教育、重工业和玩具等。

sense_info_list.en: involving a lot of work or activity;very busy
sense_info_list.zh: 繁忙的; 辛苦的; 沉重的

examination_example.sentence: It is created to carry out the <highlight>heavy</highlight> building tasks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是为了执行繁重的建筑任务而创建的。

examination_example.sentence: He felt like there was a <highlight>heavy</highlight> weight on his shoulders as he walked home alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他一个人走回家时，他觉得肩上担子很沉重。

examination_example.sentence: The government will take action to solve the problem of <highlight>heavy</highlight> extracurricular burdens (课外负担) on primary and middle school students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府将采取行动解决中小学生课外负担重的问题。

sense_info_list.en: a heavy meal is large in amount and often difficult to digest
sense_info_list.zh: 量大的; 难以消化的

examination_example.sentence: Avoid <highlight>heavy</highlight> or hot foods
examination_example.sentence_trans: 避免难以消化的或热的食物

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Heavy</highlight> and spicy foods may give you heartburn or other digestive problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 难以消化的和辛辣的食物可能会让你有烧心或其他消化系统问题。

sense_info_list.en: something that is solid in appearance or structure, or is made of a thick material

examination_example.sentence: Some <highlight>heavy</highlight> clouds, swept from the sky by a rising wind, had left the moon bright.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一股上升的风从天空中扫过，吹开了厚重的云层，露出明亮的月色。
